description: Detects the modification of a ServiceDLL value in the service settings
name: ServiceDll Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Parameters\\ServiceDll) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\spool\\drivers\\x64\\3\\PrintConfig.dll") OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\lsass.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\NTDS\\Parameters\\ServiceDll AND winlog.event_data.Details:"%%systemroot%%\\system32\\ntdsa.dll"))))
author: frack113
